item.title: BET Development
item.description: BET Development [Butler, Estep, Tavener] Method + Mattis, Graham, Walsh, Pilosov github.com/UT-CHG/BET About Purpose: Implement the novel method developed by the aforementioned authors GNU General Public License First released 2014 Python 2.7, upgraded to 3.6 Overview About/Motivation Git-Based Workflow Contribution, Communication Testing, Coverage, Versioning Pull Requests Continuous Integration Documentation Publishing, Releases, Licenses About/Motivation Reproduce results in research Demonstrate utility of approach Upgrading Python 2.
